name: Sensicast Systems
overview: Sensicast Systems, Inc. provides enterprise-class wireless sensor networks solutions for mission critical applications. It offers SensiNet platform, a general purpose wireless sensor network for a range of applications in industrial and commercial environments; wireless smart sensors that provide customers with the real-time process, equipment status, and environmental information for analysis and decision making; and Services Gateway, a self-contained network management and access appliance that provides data access and external communications for SensiNet. The company also provides Mesh Router, an intelligent repeater that optimizes and extends the operating range of a SensiNet wireless sensor; SensiNet software that connects to external systems, such as custom and software, legacy applications, or web-based applications through a set of web-standard interfaces; and SensiNet technology, a mesh networking protocol that automatically manages the Sensicast mesh network, as well as provides mesh network performance in collecting, routing, and delivering sensor data. In addition, it offers general purpose temperature monitoring kits and power monitoring kits. The company provides various temperature and humidity monitoring, as well as data center temperature, power, and ventilation monitoring solutions. Sensicast Systems, Inc. was formerly known as Distribute Wireless Network, Inc. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Needham, Massachusetts.
